column5: Ingredients : sugar, lime, strawberry. Wash the strawberries and remove their stalks. In a mixer, add the crushed ice and the strawberries. Squeeze the limes. In a bowl, combine the tequila, the cointreau and 2 tbsp of sugar and the lime...
A hearty mound of Froot Loops, served with a milk sauce.

Ingredients : rice, olive oil, curry, water, garlic. Heat the oil in a rather deep frying pan. Pour the two cups of rice in, then let it brown for 3 min. Pour 2 cups of water on the rice. Add the bouillon cube then the curry...
